quest.name: In Pursuit of Knowledge
journal:
 Quest Sync
Korille is at her wit's end.
objectives: Express your /doubt to the hardheaded Viis.
Defeat the Children of the Everlasting Dark.

dialogue.name: KORILLE
dialogue.text: I am searching for a friend. She is yea high, sandy colored hair─have you seen her?

dialogue.name: KORILLE
dialogue.text: ...No? <sigh> Then I suppose she is off getting herself in trouble.

dialogue.name: KORILLE
dialogue.text: She is obsessed with learning all she can of Ronka's history, you see, and has been planning to infiltrate Woven Oath to see the murals there. I told her not to go but she refuses to listen.

dialogue.name: KORILLE
dialogue.text: If you were to express your doubt of her schemes, perhaps she can be persuaded to return.

dialogue.name: KORILLE
dialogue.text: Please, you have to find her before it is too late.

dialogue.name: KORILLE
dialogue.text: I know she means well, but this time she has gone too far.

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: Korille sent you to bring me home?

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: But I am so close! I cannot─will not─go back!

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: The murals may have knowledge that can help my people. Help you. It would be foolish not to try.

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: And now is the perfect time. They seem off balance today. As if intruders had already...come... It was you.

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: Then you should know better than anyone that my plan will work. If you can draw the attention of even three of their guards, that is all I need.

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: If all goes as planned, I will see you back at Fanow.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: She seems preoccupied with something in the distance. Perhaps expressing your doubts about her plan will garner her attention.

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned. Thank you again for your help at Woven Oath.

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: The murals were more beautiful than I dared imagine. And some much older.

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: I drew sketches of them that I could continue my studies here. If I should find anything of import, you will be the first to know.

dialogue.name: WOVENOATHKORILLE
dialogue.text: But before that, I must first go and apologize to Korille.
